az.gloss: the azimuth of a celestial body is the angle between the vertical plane containing it and the plane of the meridian
a state in southwestern United States

azactam.gloss: an antibiotic (trade name Azactam) used against severe infections

azadirachta.gloss: genus of large important East Indian trees: neem trees

azadirachta indica.gloss: large semi-evergreen tree of the East Indies

azaleastrum.gloss: group of evergreen or deciduous shrubs formerly considered a separate genus

azathioprine.gloss: an immunosuppressive drug (trade name Imuran) used to prevent rejection of a transplanted organ

azedarach.gloss: tree of northern India and China having purple blossoms and small inedible yellow fruits

azederach.gloss: tree of northern India and China having purple blossoms and small inedible yellow fruits

azerbaijan.gloss: a landlocked republic in southwestern Asia

azerbaijani republic.gloss: a landlocked republic in southwestern Asia

azerbajdzhan.gloss: a landlocked republic in southwestern Asia

azerbajdzhan republic.gloss: a landlocked republic in southwestern Asia

azido group.gloss: the univalent group N3- derived from hydrazoic acid

azido radical.gloss: the univalent group N3- derived from hydrazoic acid

azimuth.gloss: the azimuth of a celestial body is the angle between the vertical plane containing it and the plane of the meridian

azithromycin.gloss: a systemic antibacterial medicine (trade name Zithromax) that is prescribed to treat bacterial infections in many different parts of the body

azo group.gloss: the bivalent group -N=N- united to two hydrocarbon groups

azo radical.gloss: the bivalent group -N=N- united to two hydrocarbon groups

azoimide.gloss: a colorless explosive liquid that is volatile and poisonous and foul-smelling

azolla.gloss: a genus of fern sometimes placed in its own family Azollaceae

azolla caroliniana.gloss: small free-floating aquatic fern from the eastern United States to tropical America

azollaceae.gloss: used in some classifications for the genus Azolla

azores.gloss: islands in the Atlantic Ocean belonging to Portugal

azotaemia.gloss: accumulation in the blood of nitrogenous waste products (urea) that are usually excreted in the urine

azotemia.gloss: accumulation in the blood of nitrogenous waste products (urea) that are usually excreted in the urine

azt.gloss: an antiviral drug (trade name Retrovir) used in the treatment of AIDS

aztec lily.gloss: Mexican bulbous herb cultivated for its handsome bright red solitary flower

aztec marigold.gloss: a stout branching annual with large yellow to orange flower heads

aztreonam.gloss: an antibiotic (trade name Azactam) used against severe infections

azure.gloss: of a deep somewhat purplish blue color similar to that of a clear October sky

azygos vein.gloss: one of a system of veins that drain the thoracic and abdominal walls

azygous vein.gloss: one of a system of veins that drain the thoracic and abdominal walls

azotemic.gloss: of or involving excess nitrogenous waste products in the urine (usually due to kidney insufficiency)
